entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 9:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: NW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
